name: Laser Lord
overview: It is the year 2113. You are the supreme laser warrior of Earth, you are the only being capable of operating the orbiting Laserblast weapon "Guardian". Finally war has broken out. The Martian fleet is warping through space towards Earth, you are the only hope of survival. Beware also for meteor attacks arranged by the Martians, these limit your manoeuvrebility and could destroy you if a direct hit is scored, during an attack "Guardian" shuts down in order to conserve power for the next wave and so could be vulnerable, it is up to you to anticipate attacks and to position "Guardian" safely.
